filing_deadlines.complaint: 4 years for contract, 2 years for personal injury

discovery_deadlines.depositions: Must be noticed at least 5 days before the deposition date
discovery_deadlines.disclosures: Automatic disclosures required within 45 days of service

filing_deadlines.trial_deadlines: Depends on court docket, typically 12-18 months
filing_deadlines.appeal_deadlines: 30 days from entry of final judgment

court_procedures.mandatory_arbitration: Cases under $15,000 may be subject to mandatory arbitration

fee_schedule.miscellaneous_fees: Varies by county and specific requirements

filing_requirements.page_limits: Limited by local rules, typically 10-15 pages for motions
